value_type.description: The type of value stored in the metafield (e.g., single, array)

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the resource that owns the metafield

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created

description.description: The description or details of the metafield

type.description: The data type of the metafield's value (e.g., string, integer)

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop linked to the metafield

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier of the metafield in the GraphQL Admin API

namespace.description: The namespace under which the metafield is defined

id.description: The unique identifier of the metafield

value.description: The actual value stored in the metafield

owner_resource.description: The type or resource that owns the metafield (e.g., Article, Product)

key.description: The key or identifier used to access the metafield
